title: Counter beer for wear
summary: Do you want to drink beer, and tomorrow go by car? Correct calculation prommiley
developerAddress: г. Москва, ул Нарвская, дом 1А, корпус 2
description: Counter beer - an application for handheld devices allows you to:  - Note the number of drunk beers;  - Displays the current blood alcohol content;  - Allows you to determine whether you can get behind the wheel;
descriptionHTML:
Counter beer - an application for handheld devices allows you to:
- Note the number of drunk beers;
- Displays the current blood alcohol content;
- Allows you to determine whether you can get behind the wheel;
